FEATURED BROKER More Texas brokers Terry Smith, CBI, CB A T Smith Group T Smith Group is a full service Business Brokerage, Business Valuation, and Business Consulting Group offering confidential, professional and effective services for buying and selling businesses, and for professional business valuations provided in support of the buy/sell process or for any reason a professional valuation is needed. Consultation services are provided for development of business... Established Businesses for Sale Asking Price Cash Flow Location Income Producing - National Tenant - 8+ CA... $300,000 $24,480 Raymondville... Income Producing
Income Producing Investment - Free-standing building with national SUBWAY Restaurant as tenant. Great terms&options to renew. ALSO available is 2nd SUBWAY Investment Package located in Mercedes, Texas. Call or e-mail Listing Agent for full packages on both. Deli in an Office/Condo Building $139,000 $91,056 Houston... Great Deli in Office Building. Short Hours.
This is a Deli located in the tunnel system in Downtown Houston. The Deli is located under a 25 story building. The hours are from 7am to 2:30pm 5 days per week, closed weekends and holidays. The menu consists of an American style breakfast and lunch is mostly Mediterranean including Gyros, chicken wraps, salads, soups, etc. The rent is $3,700 per month including CAM. The... Bar B Que Restaurant/Catering with Propert... $785,000 Dallas, TX... Outstanding Opportunity to own the Business AND Property!
First time on the market! Now is your chance to own a well run Bar B Que restaurant and catering business and also own the land and building!! No longer pay rent to a landlord and never own the building/property!! The business is located just off a major freeway on a very busy street. The business has an impressive list of catering clients as well as a very nice walk in... Exceptional Restaurant/Bar in Hot Frisco A... $165,000 $130,000 Frisco/Mckin... Exceptional Restaurant/Bar in Hot Frisco Area $ Seller Financing Available
Some places just have that "feel" of great chemistry..warm atmosphere and very customer friendly..this beautiful restaurant/bar has all that and more..prime area..plenty of parking..higher income area and most important great reviews..food is exceptional..bar is inviting...currently run absentee a working owner can greatly increase gross and net by more customer... Hot! Brazilian Carving Type Retaurant&Ba... $475,000 $225,000 Noth Dallas... Hot! Brazilian Carving Type Restaurant&Bar
The Brazilian carving type restaurant is one of the hottest concepts going with great following. However..the competitions price point per customer has always been on the high end leaving many potential customers wanting. The uniqueness of this Brazilian concept is a much lower price point affordable to the vast majority..It is this..high quality food and also added... Restaurants $100,000 - $200,000 N. Dallas, TX Run a BizBuySell Valuation Report to view details of this business and 700+ other recently for sale and sold Restaurants in Texas .
5 Franchised Restaurants-Texas Family Styl... $7,476,042 $963,414 San... 5 Texas Family Style Restaurants with Management in Place $ Seller Financing Available
Long time established, strong Franchise Brands operating under same ownership and management for up to 28 years in 4 Texas cities. Owners do not live in the cities where restaurants are located. All locations have either a manager/general manager with most having been with the family for many years. Very loyal employees with several having worked their way up through the... Very Profitable Barbeque $395,000 $190,000 Mid... Very Profitable Barbeque $ Seller Financing Available
This well received barbecue is very profitable and in a good location of retail, residential and industrial. Four points of sale-sit down..take out..drive thru and catering. Trade name recognition is strong. Atmosphere is very comfortable and customer friendly. All equipment is in great condition. Extremely cheap rent has more money in your pocket. sales are going north... Terrificl! Turn Key Hamburger Restaurant $375,000 $195,000 Dallas/Subur... Terrificl! Turnkey Hamburger&Casual Food Restaurant $ Seller Financing Available
This great hamburger and casual restaurant is very profitable yet is constantly growing with high customer satisfaction and repeat business. The atmosphere is very unique being a general country type store selling candies etc. up front with the restaurant being very warm and inviting. Exceptional food but a simple menu consisting of hamburgers, some barbecue items,... Terrific! Addison Area Restaurant&Bar $435,000 $200,000 Addison, TX... Terrific! Addison Area Restaurant&Bar
This extremely customer appealing restaurant and bar is in a superb location. Doing over one million gross and very profitable- a hands on owner can bring much more to the table than the present absentee ownership. Addison is a great destination area for both restaurant and bar patrons and this has the premium location everyone would like to have. The fully equipped bar... High Volume Barbecue with Real Estate $2,400,000 $200,000 Allen/Wylie,... High Volume Barbecue with Real Estate
This long established barbecue is in a fast growing area with four points of sale..sit down, take out, drive thru and catering. Located on a very busy and major road... traffic only increases. They staff is very reliable and the customer base is very consistent. Catering is unlimited as more and more business comes from the increase of the area. The free standing... Very Profitable Two Unit Pizza Restaurants $1,050,000 $415,000 Far North... Very Profitable Two Unit Pizza Restaurant $ Seller Financing Available
These two north Dallas NON franchise pizza restaurants are in upscale areas..very profitable..unsurpassed product..beautifully decorated businesses with plenty of parking and appropriate rents...High net profit $375,000 to $415,000. Often rated as the best pizza there is great repeat customer satisfaction. Sit down-take out and delivery. Absentee run with no royalty fees... Seller is forced to sell quickly and has reduced the price by more than 25%. This restaurant has been consistently profitable. It has great visibility and is located in the premier spot in a new strip center in the Clear Lake / NASA area. The center is located in an affluent area surrounded by quality businesses and ten hotels within three blocks. A new hospital is being... About BizBuySell
BizBuySell is the leading online marketplace for finding and selling Texas Restaurant businesses available for sale. Due to our industry leading traffic, more business sellers choose BizBuySell as their marketplace of choice. That means if you are looking for new Texas Restaurants, you can find the best selection of what's available right here, including Fast Food Restaurant, Indian Restaurant, Bistro and other great Restaurant businesses.
If you don't find what you are looking for here, don't fret. Consider setting an email alert and we'll notify you each time a business matching your criteria becomes available, or better yet, try contacting a business broker with experience in Restaurant businesses in Texas Search for Texas Restaurant Businesses For Sale
